name: Zombie_Invasion
description:
4 different maps to play, some maps have traps to help you kill zombies!

8 unique power ups

3 different enemy types

Simple controls: Up arrows, WASD, space and enter

This game is inspired by Stardew Valley's arcade game Journey of the Prairie King

and also Call of Duty Zombies waves system. The enemies become stronger, more

 numerous, and spawn faster with each round.
